r.d: This extension allows php applications to communicate with any Stomp compliant Message Brokers through easy object oriented and procedural interfaces.
r.n: * new stomp_connect_error() function (pierrick) * stomp_begin, stomp_abort and stomp_commit now accept additional headers (pierrick) * new connection timeout and read timeout ini configuration (pierrick) * Fix a memory leak in stomp_read_line (pierrick) * Better set of test (Pierrick and Anis)
